message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
I understand you want a larger share, so how about a 52/48 split in your favor?
I'll compromise, 58-42 is as low as I'll go for now
This is a serious offer, Alice.  We're losing money fast.  54/46.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and yours, 57-43, don't let the money lose more value
Alice, we're running out of time!  This is the same offer as before.  Let's be reasonable and take the deal!
